ping.success:
Pong! Successfully check ping! (Exclude message creation speed, ping is updated each 30 seconds)
Ping: %s%1;ms
This message creation speed: %s%2;ms (This is relate response speed of Discord)

help.title: List of commands
help.tips: If there are don't know about commands, Type "help [Command Name]" to can show command details.

error.one: Please type character code (General code is UTF-8. But, some japanese device is recommend use Shift_JIS)
error.two: Invalid character code. Please type "help qr code" to check list of character codes.
error.three: Please type text want conversion to qr code (Email, URL etc...)
